Reviews.Title: I liked
Reviews.Author: nelson mora
Reviews.Content: this is in my opinion the right camera, this is what I need, thanks for this item, all my family will enjoy

Reviews.Title: Vivitar Digital Camera With TFT Screen (V25N-GRAPE)
Reviews.Author: Sandra L.
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price (it was the cheapest on Amazon). It does take pictures and video but the quality isn't great. It's a good camera for beginners and kids (my son basically uses it as a toy). You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: awful camera
Reviews.Author: Alexis prince
Reviews.Content: This camera is very cheap and disfunctional. It is better to buy a disposal camera. This camera does not take good pics.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Klein
Reviews.Content: Tried to use it, has awful pictures, not enough pixels. Would love to return it. The downlaod to computer for pictures is easy, but the pictures aren't worth downloading.

Reviews.Title: Unimpressive
Reviews.Author: pete
Reviews.Content: Not much. To cut down on the blurring, hold camera rock still and only use on very bright, sunny days.

Reviews.Title: good camera for a beginner who doesn't mind loosing pics.
Reviews.Author: Amy Hanenberger
Reviews.Content: It was not at all what I expected. It has no place for a memory card to save pics. If batteries die u lose all pics in camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Digital still camera photo mode
1.5-Inch screen size
Features movie-clip capability
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Digital Camera With TFT Screen (V25N-GRAPE)
